post.body: Can you please drive nicely behind me without tweeting? ☺
Girls car
The thing you have to watch out for is this - shortly after buying an S5, they'll launch an RS5! It's all marketing.
My honest advice is wait till the new Audi RS4 is out. It's going to be mind blowing........
I think craig would look good in an Opel tigra. ☺
I know a few bodybuilding women that have that very same ability :-)
Too cute ☺
OH my hat!
Ok let's move down to cubana now and do a proper job!
Dats da whole point! ☺
It means you respect my competitive advantage! ✌
My wife? Competitive? Never! If she can't win she just eliminates the competition...... In their sleep.
Just stick to "oh my hat!" and you'll never go wrong! ☺
Not even 30 minutes out of Pretoria and the mullet is still very popular. And it sits on the side of the road.
My poker game seems to finally be getting back on track.
http://twitpic.com/t3it - @Craigrodney There can be only one!!! ☺
http://twitpic.com/suem - Eish! Congestion. Building please don't collapse.
http://twitpic.com/sszs - My Marcus figurine was lonely so I bought the rest of the series ☠
Why is it that Cadbury's dairy milk chocolate always tastes better at 04h23?
I seriously need to stop my vampire habit.
http://twitpic.com/sgs6 - He is 30cm high, he carries more ammunition than any other man and he fears ... Nothing! He is Marcus Fenix.
New nickelback album rocks!
http://twitpic.com/s4gz - something unsettling about surgeons waiting rooms. the place where you wait to be told how you're gonna get sliced
http://twitpic.com/rw0b - Alcohol....the mother of braveness.
Wants to know how he will cope without his mugg and bean breakfast on Christmas morning. ☪
thinks his wife's cookies are the Shiznit..
Gears of War 1 is about to get revisited!.....
http://twitpic.com/vvjm - Cookie time!
I just want all my friends to know that..... Should my house blow away in this storm, with me in it ..... It's been real. ✌
Is at home, repairing from intoxication.
Is officially intoxicated and find ing that liquid cocaine is a good substitute for flaming lamborghinis... Long live the maverick. ☠☠☠☠☠
Exactly 1 year today since the car accident that almost ended my life. Life is good. ★ ★★★★
http://twitpic.com/v9mf - I need practice. But it's coming. ☃
Is tired of not having a cool outside area to lounge in, so I have pulled out my architectural degree, pencil and ruler. ★
http://twitpic.com/uyhp - On da scoot
http://twitpic.com/uxmm - Wiiiiiinggs!!! ☠☠☠
http://twitpic.com/uxat - Post game farm cleaning of da TT... ☺
Thinks it's perfectly normal to pitch up at mugg and bean at 13h00 for breakfast. ☠
http://twitpic.com/u4yj - @annaling Dat is not da mighty bush - Dis is!... Sorry, just a bit of bush holiday humour ☺
http://twitpic.com/tvgx - This is the look of a man wondering what to tweet. ☛
